title: T206's all sold or traded.  Thanks to all!
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: T206's all sold or traded.  Thanks to all!
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I am also looking to trade for T206's raw or SGC graded 20's or 30's.  I am looking to add some quantity to the collection.  Tougher backs always welcome.
Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

T206 Brown WASH SC 350, 30 PSA 3- $125 (SOLDDD)
T206 Smith OLD MILL CHI-BOS PSA 4- $240.00 TRADED)
T206 Klienow SC 350-460 Fact 42 PSA 4- $190.00 (TRADED)
T206 Titus OLD MILL SGC 50- $100.00 (TRADED)
T206 Ganzel Polar Bear SGC 50- $50.00 (TRADED)
T206 Dahlen Brooklyn SGC 20- $120.00 (SOLDDD)
T206 Tannehill SOV 460 SGC 50- $70.00  (SOLDDDD, LC)
T206 Schreck CYCLE 350 SGC 40- $70.00 (SOLDDD, LC)
T206 Hal Chase Pink P150, with Howie McCormick stamp (VGEXish, but w/ glue lines on back, raw)- $125.00  (SOLDDDD)

Hey Bob,

I'll take the McCormick stamped Hal Chase, and will hold it for Ed Mccollum, as I know he collects these.  I'm sending an email now.

Edited:  I managed to reserve the card for Ed.  I have also sent him an email through the board to let him know that he's got another one for his collection.

Edited one more time: Bob, I sent payment for the card. The pink CHASE is on HOLD for Ed, until he can contact me.  This is one more he can add to his collection.

Raw Chase/McCormick on hold for Eric.  New lot price reflects the sale of that card.
Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

Bump for price drop due to AMEX demanding money and my expense checking not coming back for another two weeks.
Got to hate the man!
Thanks for looking,
Bob

posts.post_title: Bump for new prices and trades
posts.post_content:
Let me know if you all want to trade some low grade T206's for these.  I am looking to add a little girth to the collection.
Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

Bob,

I'm interested in the Kleinow & Smith.
Have a number of cards available to trade.
Let's talk.

Hank
[url]henryjlevy@yahoo.com[/url]

E-mail sent on the Smith if it's still available.
Thanks,
Scott.

Bump for subtractions and price reduction on the Brown WASH.
Thanks to all of the traders.  I will be traveling Monday-Sunday, so would like to move the last card today or Sunday.
Bob
